testcase.name: Positive: Invoke demoQA website, fill form and submit
testcase.system-out: * configure driver = { type: 'chrome' } ................................... passed * configure retry = {count: 3, interval: 2000} ............................ passed * def myWebUrl = baseWebUrl ............................................... passed * def token = authRequest.authToken ....................................... passed * def token_type = authRequest.authType ................................... passed * def headerBody = read('classpath:MicroServiceDefinitionLayer/Config/headerManager.json') . passed Given driver myWebUrl ..................................................... passed * fullscreen() ............................................................ passed * waitUntil("document.title == 'ToolsQA'") ................................ passed * click('{}Elements') ..................................................... passed * waitFor('{}Forms').click() .............................................. passed * waitForEnabled('{}Practice Form').click() ............................... passed * def textBoxes = locateAll("//input[@type='text']") ...................... passed * def size = karate.sizeOf(textBoxes) ..................................... passed * print 'No Of @type text fields: ', size ................................. passed * textBoxes[0].input('Viswanath') ......................................... passed * textBoxes[1].input('Thothadri') ......................................... passed * textBoxes[2].input('tester@test.com') ................................... passed * textBoxes[3].input('0400000000') ........................................ passed * textBoxes[4].click() .................................................... passed * click('{label}Male') .................................................... passed * waitFor("//*[@class='react-datepicker__tab-loop']") ..................... passed * click('{button}Previous Month') ......................................... passed * locate("//div[@class='react-datepicker__day react-datepicker__day--003']").click() . passed And match value('#dateOfBirthInput') == '03 Aug 2020' ..................... passed * click('{label}Sports') .................................................. passed * click('{label}Music') ................................................... passed * input('#currentAddress', '999 Bourke Street') ........................... passed * screenshot() ............................................................ passed * input('input[id=react-select-3-input]', ['Rajasthan', Key.ENTER]) ....... passed * waitForEnabled('#react-select-4-input').input('Jaipur') ................. passed * input('#react-select-4-input', Key.ENTER) ............................... passed * scroll('#submit').screenshot() .......................................... passed * click('#submit') ........................................................ passed * waitFor('{}Thanks for submitting the form').screenshot() ................ passed
